content: There are there folders in the corpus, ‘midis’, ‘wavs’, ‘textgrids’. MIDI is labeled according to human voice.   TextGrid file contains boundary informations.

title: Download

content: The Opencpop dataset is available to download for non-commercial purposes under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License. The corpus copyright remains with the original owners of Opencpop Team. If want to use it commercially, you are welcome to contact us by email(zpcoftts@gmail.com). Please use in accordance with Chinese and international laws.
